description:
A pink-haired succubus who looks like a little girl but is definitely fully adult. Like Carerra, she is usually successful in capturing souls, and is often on the receiving end of Carerra`s sexual attentions.
Rati is shown at one point wielding a type of mace in combat against heaven`s guardians. She does not appear to be very adept as she is still captured.
name: Rati
